en: Building the Picture: Architecture in Italian Renaissance Painting

This set of zoomable images was created for the National Gallery publication ‘Building the Picture:  Architecture in Italian Renaissance Painting’.  This was published in association with the exhibition ‘Building the Picture’, which was held at the National Gallery from 30 April to 21 September 2014.
